name: Microsoft To Do Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Microsoft To Do Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Microsoft To Do API.

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Microsoft To Do API. | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: task
available_options: Linked Resource (值: linkedResource)
List (值: list)
Task (值: task)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Create (值: create)
Delete (值: delete)
Get (值: get)
Get Many (值: getAll)
Update (值: update)

taskListId.name: taskListId
taskListId.description: The identifier of the list, unique in the user's mailbox. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
taskListId.natural_language_description: 参数名: List Name or ID | 作用: The identifier of the list, unique in the user's mailbox. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

taskId.name: taskId
taskId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Task ID | (必填项)

displayName.name: displayName
displayName.natural_language_description: 参数名: New List Name | 作用: List display name | (必填项)

applicationName.name: applicationName
applicationName.description: App name of the source that is sending the linked entity
applicationName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Application Name | 作用: App name of the source that is sending the linked entity | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: content (值: None) - The content of the task
dueDateTime (值: None) - The date in the specified time zone that the task is to be finished
reminderDateTime (值: None) - The date in the specified time zone that the task is to be reminded
importance (值: None) - The importance of the task
status (值: None) - Indicates the state or progress of the task

linkedResourceId.name: linkedResourceId
linkedResourceId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Linked Resource ID | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: content (值: None) - The content of the task
dueDateTime (值: None) - The date in the specified time zone that the task is to be finished
reminderDateTime (值: None) - The date in the specified time zone that the task is to be reminded
importance (值: None) - The importance of the task
status (值: None) - Indicates the state or progress of the task
title (值: None) - A brief description of the task

title.name: title
title.description: A brief description of the task
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Subject | 作用: A brief description of the task | (必填项)

listId.name: listId
listId.description: The identifier of the list, unique in the user's mailbox
listId.natural_language_description: 参数名: List ID | 作用: The identifier of the list, unique in the user's mailbox | (必填项)
